segments.text: No , it is the original one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is silver gray , while I remember your handset was black .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have changed a case for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can a handset case be changed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . That's why I bought this type . I can change its case frequently , so it is novel to use it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are two more , one is orange and the other is pink . I have bought them all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really going to be fresh all the time .
segments.speaker: S1
